strapiPost.title: Heroes Coffee Announces Plans To Open New Location Next To Ramen Nara in Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Heroes Coffee has big news brewing â€“ a new location coming right next to Ramen Nara! The popular Roastery & Cafe, currently in downtown Bentonville and the Pinnacle area of Rogers, offers a unique menu of coffee drinks, teas, smoothies and snacks sure to satisfy.

  • Caffeinated creations: Heroes' signature lattes come hot or cold in flavors like German Chocolate Cake, Peanut Butter Cup, Raspberry Turtle and Honey Salted Caramel.
  • Something for everyone: In addition to coffee, smoothies and tea, they also offer oats, muffins, scones, gluten-free banana bread, gluten-free pumpkin bread, cookies and more!
